price: Daabi, Yεbͻͻ woi nom ne wͻn agyanom akͻnhoma kͻpem sε nkwa (nna no) yεε (wͻn ani so) tenten maa wͻn. Enti (boniayεfoͻ no) nhunuu sε Yεrete nsaase (a na wͻdi so tumi no) so nkakrankakra firi ahyeε no soͻ? Enti wͻn na wͻbɛdi nkonim?
arabic: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡنَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ طَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡعُمُرُۗ أَفَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَنَّا نَأۡتِي ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنۡ أَطۡرَافِهَآۚ أَفَهُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bal mattaʿnā hāulāi waābāahum ḥattā ṭāla ʿalayhimu al-ʿumuru afalā yarawna annā natī al-arḍa nanquṣuhā min aṭrāfihā afahumu al-ghālibūna
